content: 10 6mm circular needles or dpn s for child size using long tail cast on or your preferred co join in the round being careful not to twist the stitches and place bor stitch marker round 1 * k1 p1* repeat round 1 until your beanie reaches approximately single brim measured from the cast on edge folded brim measured from the bottom of brim folded to desired brim height xxs 6 -7 xs 7 -8 s 7 5 -8 m 7 5 -8 5 l 8 -9 for a fitted style the hat should reach to about the top of your head before you begin closing you may knit further for a slouchy style note that the decrease is relatively quick only three row if you have a smaller head you may knit the body shorter and if you have a larger than average head you may knit the body taller decrease transfer your work to dpn s or use magic loop when needed for the decrease round 1 * k2 k2tog * xxs 36 xs 42 s 48 m 54 l 57 round 2 * k1 k2tog * xxs 24 xs 28 s 32 m 36 l 38 round 3 * k2tog* xxs 12 xs 14 s 16 m 18 l 19 round 4 * k2tog * xxs 6 xs 7 s 8 m 9 l 10 for size l last stitch will be a k1 cut your yarn leaving about 10 remaining close and weave in the ends you may opt to attach a yarn or fur pom pom there is a tutorial on how to attach pom poms on my youtube channel linked on page 1 bonanza beanie - 3
